statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ISNULL(M1.SORT_SEQ, 99999), PP.PRODUCT_TYPE, ISNULL(M2.SORT_SEQ, 99999), PP.CATEGORY, PP.PRODUCT_NAME, PP.PRODUCT_CODE) AS ROW_NO , ISNULL(M1.NAME, PP.PRODUCT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_TYPE , ISNULL(M2.NAME, PP.CATEGORY) AS CATEGORY , AA.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCT_ID , PP.PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE , PP.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME , M3.NAME AS PRODUCT_UNIT , AA.SALE_AMT , AA.BASE_AMT , AA.PURC_AMT , AA.PROD_AMT , AA.ADJS_AMT , AA.BLNC_AMT , AA.COST_AMT , AA.SALE_AMT - AA.COST_AMT AS PRFT_AMT , CASE WHEN AA.SALE_AMT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (AA.SALE_AMT - AA.COST_AMT)/AA.SALE_AMT END AS PRFT_RAT , AA.COST_PRICE , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UBZ.INVENTORY_MON AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS PP WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = PP.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 ON PP.PRODUCT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'PRODUCT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M2 ON PP.CATEGORY = M2.CODE AND M2.PARENT_CODE = 'CATEGORY' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M3 ON PP.UNIT_TYPE = M3.CODE AND M3.PARENT_CODE = 'UNIT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.CLOSING_YM = #CLOSING_YM# AND PP.PRODUCT_TYPE NOT IN ('M')
AND PP.PRODUCT_TYPE = #PRODUCT_TYPE#
AND PP.CATEGORY = #CATEGORY#
AND AA.PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
ORDER BY ROW_NO
